summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Animal Control; adding definitions of dangerous and potentially dangerous animals; adding and expanding definitions of different classifications of animals; clarifying the Director's authority to detain and dispose of certain animals; amending the appeals process and the authority of the Hearing Examiner on appeal; separating the licensing requirement from the vaccination requirement; increasing the insurance requirement for guard dogs, granting an exemption to the requirement to display a current license and amending Chapter 9.25 and Chapter 9.26 of the Seattle Municipal Code in accordance therewith.
